definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Liddy, the master's great-granddaughter, was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.chinese: 丽蒂是作坊师傅的重孙女，和巴丝谢芭年龄相仿。

sentences.english: This effect, in analogy to its radiofrequency counterpart, is known as optical rectification.
sentences.chinese: 同它的射频对应物相仿，这种现象称为光学整流。

sentences.english: Because congenial delight, he and a similar age man become true friendship.
sentences.chinese: 因情趣相投，他和一个年纪相仿的男人成为莫逆之交。

sentences.english: Like blood , like good and like age , make the happiest marriage .
sentences.chinese: 门当户对，品行相近，年龄相仿，是最完美的婚姻。

sentences.english: Per the Zetas, the Dark Twin is approximately the same size as the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 按齐塔人的说法，孪星的大小和地球相仿。

sentences.english: Sor Juana and Maria became intimate friends, due to their closeness in age.
sentences.chinese: 琼娜和玛利亚年纪相仿，立即成为好友。

sentences.english: Most students perfer to communicate with classmates for they are in the same age stage.
sentences.chinese: 大多数同学喜欢和同学朋友交流因为他们年龄相仿。

sentences.english: Within a space, children of similar age tend to gravitate toward each other.
sentences.chinese: 在同一个场所内，年龄相仿的儿童往往互相吸引。

sentences.english: The second kind is a hornlessoceandragon, sometimes equated with a sea serpent.
sentences.chinese: 第二种是无角的海龙，有时候相仿于一条大海蛇。

sentences.english: The effect of TCM is similar to that of CC and HMG.
sentences.chinese: 中医中药在促排卵治疗中的效果与CC和HMG相仿。

sentences.english: She's about my age, with longish hair.
sentences.chinese: 她年龄与我相仿，头发较长。

sentences.english: Tunisia now has a birth rate similar to that of France.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯目前的生育率与法国相仿。

sentences.english: He has always assorted with men of his own age.
sentences.chinese: 他总是和年令与自己相仿的人交往。

sentences.english: Li Hua and I have similar interests.
A girl of about my age was standing beside a pot of geraniums.
sentences.chinese: 在一罐天竺葵旁，站着一个与我年龄相仿的女孩。

sentences.english: An appropriate-size tube is chosen to fit the trachea .
sentences.chinese: 选用与气管大小相仿的管子。

definition: not at all the same/substantially different
to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
to be precisely the same/to be no different
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3
